none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 26, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
Fuuuuucccckkk this is what I want. Sinister death/thrash from Russia...no need to reinvent the wheel when the shit rolls true. And this shit?! My monkeys, TERRÖRSTRIKER are a fukkn machine. Eternal cheers to Reforestation (again) for bringing these sounds to my ears.  HORDES OF ARMAGEDDON
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JKiTg1xtBF0 https://reforestationrecords.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: TerrörStriker - Hordes Of Armageddon - Terminal Escape
